meanings.definition: Carved or engraved on whalebone or ivory
meanings.sent1: The scrimshawed whalebone necklace was a prized possession.
meanings.sent2: The scrimshawed ivory figurine displayed intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The scrimshawed whalebone comb added a touch of elegance to the collection.
meanings.sent4: Her scrimshawed ivory bracelet told a story of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The scrimshawed whalebone sculpture captured the essence of marine life.

meanings.sent3: The scrimshawed picture frame made the photo stand out.
meanings.sent4: Her scrimshawed earrings sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The scrimshawed vase was a masterpiece of craftsmanship.
